dataItems.title: How Do I Add A GIft Card  into my SSBeauty Wallet ?
dataItems.Description: Go to My Account -> My Wallet  -> Select Gift Card. Enter your 16 Digit Gift Card number and 6-digit Pin Number. ->Click Add balance To Account - >The balance of the Gift Card will be added to your SS Beatuy Wallet

dataItems.title: Where Can I Use My SSBeauty Balance ?
dataItems.Description: Go to My Account -> My Wallet  -> Select Gift Card.

dataItems.title: What Happens If I Return The Items Which I have bought with SSBeauty Gift Card ?
dataItems.Description: Go to My Account -> My Wallet  -> Select Gift Card.

dataItems.title: Can my SSBeauty wallet be suspended / closed ?
dataItems.Description: Go to My Account -> My Wallet  -> Select Gift Card.

dataItems.title: Can I use partial SSBeauty wallet cash to pay for my product ?
dataItems.Description: Go to My Account -> My Wallet  -> Select Gift Card.
